lead_paragraph: Sheila C. Bair looks to be leading the regulatory race to the top, Breakingviews says. The agency she oversees, the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, recently unveiled a handful of clever ideas to contain risky bank behavior and protect the nation’s deposit insurance fund. Rival watchdogs fighting for turf will find it difficult to ignore the F.D.I.C.’s latest tactics, the publication argues.
